title: Relax in our luxuriously renovated 1 bed / 1 bath, 793 Sq Feet
neighborhood: Dallas - Within minutes of Dallas Aboretum
posting_body: ['Lakewood on the Trail', '101 N Brookside Dr', 'Dallas, TX 75214', 'A wonderful home in Dallas is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1655 - $2335 per month.', 'This unit comes with 793 sq ft.', 'Lakewood on the Trail offers residents a wide range of community and apartment amenities.', 'Enjoy living in one of our beautiful homes, complete with designer lighting, granite countertops, and spacious walk-in closets.', "You'll love additional touches like large bay windows to view the mature historic neighborhood!", 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '● 3 Sparkling Swimming Pools', '● Beautiful Landscaping', '● Business/Media Center', '● Clubhouse/Courtyard', '● Coffee Bar', '● Covered Parking', '● Fitness Center', '● Gated community', '● Online Services', '● Outside Fireplace', '● Package Service', '● Pet Friendly *', '● Pool', '● Property Manager/Maintenance on Site', '● A good stretch or quiet meditation in the fitness studio', '● Access to Santa Fe / White Rock Lake Trail', '● Adjacent to the Lakewood Country Club', '● Close Proximity to Whole Foods', '● Convenient to downtown Dallas, White Rock Lake, and Hwy 75', '● Cyber cafe with High Speed Internet', '● Equipped for business with a PC and Mac', '● Public Transportation', '● Relax by the fire pit or outdoor fireplace', '● Tanning Bed', 'Unit Highlights:', '● Ceiling Fan', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Handrails', '● Oven', '● Pantry', '● Private Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Freezer', '● Two-Toned Paint', '● Window Coverings', '● Always on 2nd Floor', '● Built-In Microwaves', '● Crown Molding', '● Digital Thermostats', '● Extra Storage', '● Fireplace in Select Homes', '● New Cabinetry', '● Vaulted Ceilings', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Wood-Styled Flooring', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed.', 'One-time Fee $300.00, Rent $20.00, Deposit $300.00.', 'Call for more information.', 'Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Call leasing office for details!', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F56A02D6368B426']
